page.title: 07BROADWAY CHURCHES
page.content: There are four main churches in Broadway.{St.Michael's Church of {England}was built in 1840 and has a congregation of 200, the majority being over 50 years of age. However it runs a thriving Sunday School and makes great efforts to attract younger people.{St.Saviour's Roman Catholic {Church}originated from a Passionist Monastery. Due to failing vocations this closed in 1983 but a Passionist Priest still serves the parish. About 300 people are on the register with ages ranging from birth to 90 years but the majority are elderly.{The {Methodist Church}has 40 to 60 people attending Sunday worship mostly in the older age range.{The United Reform {Church}started in 1792 and has 65 regular churchgoers from 3 to 85 years of age. All churches rely on volunteer help for cleaning,flowers and upkeep.
